name: Gia
cast: Angelina Jolie, Faye Dunaway, Mercedes Ruehl
description: Gia is a 1998 American biographical drama television film about the life and times of one of the first supermodels, Gia Carangi. The film stars Angelina Jolie as Gia and Faye Dunaway as Wilhelmina Cooper, with Mercedes Ruehl and Elizabeth Mitchell. It was directed by Michael Cristofer and written by Cristofer and Jay McInerney. The original music score was composed by Terence Blanchard.

name: Avengers: Endgame
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner, etc.
description: Description: The culmination of Marvel's cinematic universe, the Avengers must reassemble to defeat the powerful Thanos and reverse the devastating events of Infinity War.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
description: A gripping story following the unlikely friendship between two prisoners in Shawshank State Penitentiary, as they navigate the harsh realities of prison life and hold onto hope.

name: The Godfather
cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Robert Duvall
description: A classic mafia film depicting the Corleone family's rise to power and the transformation of Michael Corleone from a reluctant family member to a ruthless crime boss.

name: Titanic
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane
description: Based on the tragic sinking of the RMS Titanic, this epic love story follows the forbidden romance between a young aristocratic woman and a working-class artist aboard the ill-fated ship.

name: Inception
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
description: A mind-bending thriller where skilled thieves enter people's dreams to steal valuable information, but face complex challenges when attempting to plant an idea instead.

name: Pulp Fiction
cast: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis
description: A nonlinear narrative artfully weaves together several interconnected stories of crime, redemption, and dark humor, creating an iconic film with memorable characters.

name: The Dark Knight
cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
description: Batman faces one of his greatest adversaries, the Joker, in a battle for Gotham City's soul, testing the limits of his morality and strength as a hero.

name: Forrest Gump
cast: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
description: This heartwarming film follows the life of Forrest Gump, a simple-minded but kind-hearted man who unwittingly becomes part of significant historic events while pursuing his love, Jenny.

name: The Matrix
cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving
description: A cyberpunk film set in a dystopian future, where a computer hacker discovers the truth about human existence being controlled within a simulated reality called the Matrix.

name: The Lion King
cast: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Nathan Lane
description: A classic Disney animated film, "The Lion King" tells the tale of a young lion prince named Simba who faces adversity and ultimately must embrace his destiny as king.

name: Fight Club
cast: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter
description: An underground fight club becomes a manifestation of societal disillusionment as an insomniac office worker and a charismatic soap salesman create an anarchic, anti-consumerist movement.
